alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 2:57AM PST until December 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
